procedure.text: Rinse the coupe with absinthe and add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker
Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass and enjoy!

Add fresh cubed ice to the mixing glass and stir the cocktail between 40 to 60 seconds
